description: Work under this contract comprises the provision of all labour, material and equipment required to complete service calls for repairs to UPS systems on an as and when required basis to 14 Wing Greenwood and CFS Barrington Coastal Radar Tower
full_summary:
# Uninterruptible Power Supply (UPS) System Maintenance Contract
=============================================

**Reference Number:** WS3761140734
**Publication Date:** 2023-03-13
**Closing Date:** 2023-04-12 14:00:00
**Trade Agreements:**

* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)

## Request for Standing Offer

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites competent suppliers to submit a bid for the provision of services for the maintenance of Uninterruptible Power Supply (UPS) systems at the following locations:

* 14 Wing Greenwood
* CFS Barrington Coastal Radar Tower

**Scope of Work:**

- All labour, material, and equipment required for service calls for repairs to UPS systems.

**Notice URL:** <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15661573?extsite=MTU2NjE1NzNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

**Contact Information:**

* Name: Rosemary Trahan
* Email: [rosemary.trahan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:rosemary.trahan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

Founded by [Your Name], 2023

## Deliverables

None are listed any exchange up this revised Notice no deliverables
